summary:
Rhodes is Greece's largest Dodecanese island and a historic capital. It's the ninth-largest Mediterranean island, located between Crete and Athens. With nicknames like "Island of the Sun" and "Island of the Knights," it's known for its rich history and beautiful beaches.

The island was once home to the Colossus of Rhodes, an ancient wonder. Today, its medieval old town is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Rhodes attracts many tourists with its stunning views and rich cultural heritage.
title: Rhodes
